short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to customize their New Tab Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces your new tab page with your exact age, the time left in the day and a quote. Provides motivation and inspiration through the visualization that Time is a ever fleeting thing.


Elements are customizable, with components having the ability to be toggled on or off. As of right there are only 2 themes (dark and light). More themes will be added soon. 

Note that when you first download this extension, you must set initial values for age, the quote and author.  

Feedback is appreciated!
